alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 2:27PM MST until March 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches, locally up to 18 inches Upper Cottonwoods, Bear River Range and Ogden Area Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains and Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...All northern Utah mountain routes will experience winter driving conditions including the Cottonwoods, Soldier Summit, Parleys Summit, Logan Summit and Laketown Summit.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
